# ranemone

*ranemone* is an R interface to [ANEMONE DB](https://db.anemone.bio/), a
database for biodiversity surveys based on environmental DNA
metabarcoding. It is managed by Dr. Michio Kondoh, Ecological
Integration Lab. at Tohoku University. This package provides an utility
to analyze data from ANEMONE DB.

## Installation

You can install the development version from
[GitHub](https://github.com/):

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("heavywatal/ranemone")
```

See [“Get
started”](https://heavywatal.github.io/ranemone/articles/ranemone.html)
for downloading data from ANEMONE DB and reading them into R.

# Package index

## All functions

- [`summarize_ncopies()`](https://heavywatal.github.io/ranemone/reference/aggregate.md)
  [`pivot_wider_ncopies()`](https://heavywatal.github.io/ranemone/reference/aggregate.md)
  : Summarize community data by species, genus, family, etc.
- [`cache_dir()`](https://heavywatal.github.io/ranemone/reference/cache-dir.md)
  : Utilities for caching
- [`summarize_alpha_diversity()`](https://heavywatal.github.io/ranemone/reference/diversity.md)
  [`calc_alpha_div()`](https://heavywatal.github.io/ranemone/reference/diversity.md)
  : Calculate alpha diversity indices
- [`wget_recursive()`](https://heavywatal.github.io/ranemone/reference/download.md)
  : Download data from ANEMONE DB
- [`directory_prefix()`](https://heavywatal.github.io/ranemone/reference/path.md)
  : Get the prefix path to the ANEMONE DB data directory.
- [`read_tsv_xz()`](https://heavywatal.github.io/ranemone/reference/read.md)
  : Read files recursively in the ANEMONE DB data directory.
